content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":79791,"originalJapaneseLine":"　織田城が落とされただとー！？","translatedEnglishLine":"Oda Castle has fallen?!"},{"lineNumber":79792,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、そんな……織田城には軍師の皆さん、","translatedEnglishLine":"N-No way... In Oda Castle, the strategists,"},{"lineNumber":79793,"originalJapaneseLine":"　香様や３Ｇさん……","translatedEnglishLine":"Lady Kaoru and Mr. 3G..."},{"lineNumber":79794,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それにランス様のお子様が……","translatedEnglishLine":"And also Lord Rance's child..."},{"lineNumber":79795,"originalJapaneseLine":"「全員、無事なんだろうな！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"They're all safe, right!?"},{"lineNumber":79796,"originalJapaneseLine":"「も、申し訳ありません。","translatedEnglishLine":"I-I'm sorry."},{"lineNumber":79797,"originalJapaneseLine":"　詳しいことはまだ私にも……","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't even have the details yet..."},{"lineNumber":79798,"originalJapaneseLine":"「とにかく、その、襲撃が急だったもので……","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, the attack was so sudden..."},{"lineNumber":79799,"originalJapaneseLine":"　取るものも取らず皆四方八方に","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone fled in all directions without taking anything,"},{"lineNumber":79800,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逃げ出す有様でして、その、うう……","translatedEnglishLine":"It was a complete rout, um..."},{"lineNumber":79801,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":79802,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"L-Lord Rance..."},{"lineNumber":79803,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行くぞ、シィル。","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go, Sheila."},{"lineNumber":79804,"originalJapaneseLine":"　織田城に戻る」","translatedEnglishLine":"We're going back to Oda Castle."},{"lineNumber":79805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-Yes!"},{"lineNumber":79806,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいのですか、ランス？","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you sure, Rance?"},{"lineNumber":79807,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍の襲撃も無視できるものでは――」","translatedEnglishLine":"We can't just ignore the demon army's attack—"},{"lineNumber":79808,"originalJapaneseLine":"「後回しだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"That can wait."},{"lineNumber":79809,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まずは妖怪軍からってだけ」","translatedEnglishLine":"First, it's the youkai army."},{"lineNumber":79810,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔軍だろうが、妖怪軍だろうが関係ない。","translatedEnglishLine":"Whether it's the demon army or the youkai army, it doesn't matter."},{"lineNumber":79811,"originalJapaneseLine":"　俺様の邪魔をする奴は","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyone who gets in my way"},{"lineNumber":79812,"originalJapaneseLine":"　全部まとめてやっつける」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll take them all down together."},{"lineNumber":79813,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行くぞ！　遅れるな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's go! Don't lag behind!"},{"lineNumber":79814,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes!"},{"lineNumber":79815,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"I see."},{"lineNumber":79816,"originalJapaneseLine":"　わかりました……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Understood..."},{"lineNumber":79817,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":79818,"originalJapaneseLine":"もう、皆が分かっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone already understood."},{"lineNumber":79819,"originalJapaneseLine":"これまで破竹の勢いで敵を打ち倒してきたランスも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even Rance, who had been defeating enemies with unstoppable momentum,"},{"lineNumber":79820,"originalJapaneseLine":"兵数に圧倒的な差がある魔軍、後ろから迫る妖怪軍、","translatedEnglishLine":"Against the overwhelming numbers of the demon army and the youkai army closing in from behind,"},{"lineNumber":79821,"originalJapaneseLine":"二つを相手にこの戦力で勝てはしないと。","translatedEnglishLine":"They could not win with these forces against both."},{"lineNumber":79822,"originalJapaneseLine":"ただいたずらに終わりの時を","translatedEnglishLine":"They were merely postponing the end point"},{"lineNumber":79823,"originalJapaneseLine":"先送りしているだけに過ぎない、と。","translatedEnglishLine":"Fooling themselves by pushing it off."},{"lineNumber":79824,"originalJapaneseLine":"しかし、誰もそんなことは言わず、","translatedEnglishLine":"However, no one said such a thing,"},{"lineNumber":79825,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場に向けて歩を進める。","translatedEnglishLine":"And they continued to march toward the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":79826,"originalJapaneseLine":"これが最後の行軍に","translatedEnglishLine":"With a feeling that this would be their final march,"},{"lineNumber":79827,"originalJapaneseLine":"なるであろうことを予感しつつ……","translatedEnglishLine":"They pressed onward..."},{"lineNumber":79828,"originalJapaneseLine":"こんなときにも関わらず――","translatedEnglishLine":"Despite such times—"},{"lineNumber":79829,"originalJapaneseLine":"空だけは平和な時代と同じように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Only the sky remained peacefully blue,"},{"lineNumber":79830,"originalJapaneseLine":"穏やかな青色をしていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Just like in peaceful days."},{"lineNumber":79831,"originalJapaneseLine":"ある日、それは突然に現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"One day, it suddenly appeared."},{"lineNumber":79832,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":79833,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お前……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You..."},{"lineNumber":79834,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おや、よくよく会いますねー」","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh, we meet quite often, don't we?"},{"lineNumber":79835,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王はどこにいる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Where is the Demon King?"},{"lineNumber":79836,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬ー鹿、誰がお前に教えるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Idiot, who would tell you?"},{"lineNumber":79837,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"......"},{"lineNumber":797838,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔王を渡してくれ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Give me the Demon King."},{"lineNumber":79839,"originalJapaneseLine":"　僕の望みはそれだけだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"That is all I desire."},{"lineNumber":79840,"originalJapaneseLine":"「断る！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I refuse!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 織田城が落とされただとー！？
「そ、そんな……織田城には軍師の皆さん、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: N-No way... In Oda Castle, the strategists,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香様や３Ｇさん……
それにランス様のお子様が……
「全員、無事なんだろうな！？」
「も、申し訳ありません。
詳しいことはまだ私にも……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't even have the details yet...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、その、襲撃が急だったもので……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, the attack was so sudden...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取るものも取らず皆四方八方に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone fled in all directions without taking anything,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逃げ出す有様でして、その、うう……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was a complete rout, um...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様……」
「行くぞ、シィル。
織田城に戻る」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We're going back to Oda Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい！」
「いいのですか、ランス？
魔軍の襲撃も無視できるものでは――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can't just ignore the demon army's attack—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後回しだ。
まずは妖怪軍からってだけ」
「魔軍だろうが、妖怪軍だろうが関係ない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Whether it's the demon army or the youkai army, it doesn't matter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様の邪魔をする奴は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyone who gets in my way

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 全部まとめてやっつける」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll take them all down together.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「行くぞ！　遅れるな！」
「はい！」
「そうですね。
わかりました……」
もう、皆が分かっていた。
これまで破竹の勢いで敵を打ち倒してきたランスも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even Rance, who had been defeating enemies with unstoppable momentum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 兵数に圧倒的な差がある魔軍、後ろから迫る妖怪軍、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Against the overwhelming numbers of the demon army and the youkai army closing in from behind,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二つを相手にこの戦力で勝てはしないと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They could not win with these forces against both.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただいたずらに終わりの時を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were merely postponing the end point

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先送りしているだけに過ぎない、と。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fooling themselves by pushing it off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、誰もそんなことは言わず、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, no one said such a thing,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場に向けて歩を進める。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And they continued to march toward the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これが最後の行軍に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a feeling that this would be their final march,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なるであろうことを予感しつつ……
こんなときにも関わらず――
空だけは平和な時代と同じように、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Only the sky remained peacefully blue,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穏やかな青色をしていた。
ある日、それは突然に現れた。
「おや、よくよく会いますねー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, we meet quite often, don't we?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔王はどこにいる？」
「馬ー鹿、誰がお前に教えるか」
「魔王を渡してくれ。
僕の望みはそれだけだ」
「断る！」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
